TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_balidas, title = balidas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/balidas} }

S.FORM: == lalangawan nida (sakauzip a mulangaway) 植物生長環境 == madihinay nu kilang a walu a lasubu a lidek nu buyu'. . sapihicahi:ca 使用方式 sakacacay; kapah satangsuyan atu sasaasik atu sapacengceng sapibuting ku banuh. . sakatusa; mangaduway a liuc sapisanga' tu saasik. 嫩葉可製成掃帚. sakauulu; asu' ka'nen tu dungec nu balidas. 嫩芽心可以吃.

== lalangawan nida (sakaozip a molangaway) 植物生長環境 == madihinay no kilang a walo a lasobo a lidek no boyo'. . sapihicahi:ca 使用方式 sakacacay; kapah satangsoyan ato sasaasik ato sapacengceng sapiboting ko banoh. . sakatosa; mangadoway a lioc sapisanga' to saasik. 嫩葉可製成掃帚. sakaoolo; aso' ka'nen to dongec no balidas. 嫩芽心可以吃.
